name: places/ChIJM2k5Ajz2wokR7LPKS9ln1yM
adrFormatAddress: 2933 Broadway, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: I had a wonderful experience here at Cohens Fashion Optical. I was so scared being that it was my very first experience ever! Kelly was a great help. She reassured me that I had nothing to worry about and even help me pick out my glasses. Which I absolutely love ! 10/10 I strongly recommend everybody to come here and ask for Kelly :) five star service

She reassured me that I had nothing to worry about and even help me pick out my glasses. Which I absolutely love ! 10/10 I strongly recommend everybody to come here and ask for Kelly :) five star service

originalText.text: The staff was welcoming and extremely helpful, guiding me through their extensive selection with expertise. The store was clean and inviting, with a wide range of stylish frames to choose from. I found the perfect pair of glasses thanks to their knowledgeable recommendations, all at a great value. Highly recommend for anyone in need of new eyewear!

text.text: The staff was welcoming and extremely helpful, guiding me through their extensive selection with expertise. The store was clean and inviting, with a wide range of stylish frames to choose from. I found the perfect pair of glasses thanks to their knowledgeable recommendations, all at a great value. Highly recommend for anyone in need of new eyewear!

originalText.text:
I came into the store for an eye exam and was talked into placing a full deposit for an annual supply of contact lenses. The idea was that if I feel comfortable with the trial contacts that the doctor gave me, I could call the store and place an order with the deposit.

However, I later realized that-
1) I was overcharged for same products that I could get way cheaper somewhere else.
2) the store failed to disclose that they are out-of-network with my vision plan. Instead, they blamed my astigmatism for the low amount of insurance benefit coverage, saying that customized contacts are naturally covered less by insurance companies.
3) the salesperson, whose name I believe is Kelly, told me that the store could only claim my insurance benefits for contacts the same day as my eye exam. As someone who didn’t grow up in the US I am not so familiar with the healthcare system at all, so I bought into her trick. After doing my research I realized that this was just a way to trick you into rush buying! What she said is not true at all. An extremely unprofessional behavior.

With all these dramas, I no longer felt comfortable doing business with this store. So I asked for a refund, only to be rejected. The store said they had a “NO REFUND” policy in place, which was inconspicuously posted at the store. Of course, it was printed on my receipt, but by the time I saw it I had already made the payment!

I had to file a complaint with NY state department of consumer affairs and hope things will get resolved.

This is a extremely shady business and I suggest you look somewhere else.

originalText.text: Every experience I’ve had at Cohen’s has been fantastic, not to mention fast: my eye exam was scheduled in for within the hour, I received my new glasses within 24 hours, and they swapped out old lenses in a couple of minutes. Giselle in particular made sure my experience was always wonderful, as has every other member of the staff who has helped me out. Cohen’s is professional, considerate, and is attentive to the customer’s needs and time — I really can’t recommend them enough, 10/10!!

Cohen’s is professional, considerate, and is attentive to the customer’s needs and time — I really can’t recommend them enough, 10/10!!

originalText.text: Daisy was so lovely as I came in to have two pairs of sunglasses adjusted, and also very patient in guiding me through their frames and contact options and pricing. A great neighbourhood staple and would come back to patronise again!
